ability.name: Adaptability
ability.gametext: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
ability.effect: Increases the Same Type Attack Bonus from *1.5 to *2.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Aerilate
ability.gametext: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
ability.effect: Increases the power of Normal-type moves by 20%. It then changes those moves to Flying-type.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Aftermath
ability.gametext: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
ability.effect: The foe that dealt the final hit loses 1/4 of its maximum HP if the move made physical contact.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Air Lock
ability.gametext: Eliminates the effects of weather.
ability.effect: All weather effects are negated while the Pokémon is on the field.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Technically this is Ability number 77, but after Cacophany was removed, it was renumbered.

ability.name: Analytic
ability.gametext: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
ability.effect: Attack power increases by 30% if the Pokémon is the last Pokémon to attack this turn.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Anger Point
ability.gametext: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
ability.effect: Increases Attack to maximum level upon taking a critical hit.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Anger Shell
ability.gametext: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Anticipation
ability.gametext: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
ability.effect: Warns when the foe knows 1-hit KO or super-effective moves.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Arena Trap
ability.gametext: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.
ability.effect: The opponent cannot run nor switch. Flying-type Pokémon and Pokémon with the Levitate special ability are unaffected. If this Pokémon switches, the opponent is still trapped for that turn. The opponent may still switch by using Baton Pass.
ability.fieldeffect: If the Pokémon is in the lead spot, chance of encountering a wild Pokémon increases to 200%.
ability.notes: This doesn't work in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet onwards.

ability.name: Armor Tail
ability.gametext: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Aroma Veil
ability.gametext: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: As One - Unnerve Chilling Neigh
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat. Prevents the opponent from using Berries.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: As One is the signature Ability of Calyrex in either its Ice Rider or Shadow Rider forms.

ability.name: As One - Unnerve Grim Neigh
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Special Attack stat. Prevents the opponent from using Berries.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: As One is the signature Ability of Calyrex in either its Ice Rider or Shadow Rider forms.

ability.name: Aura Break
ability.gametext: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Bad Dreams
ability.gametext: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This Ability originated as an attack in the TCG.

ability.name: Ball Fetch
ability.gametext: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Battery
ability.gametext: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.
ability.effect: Boosts Ally Pokémon's Special Attack by 30%.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Battle Armor
ability.gametext: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
ability.effect: Opponent’s moves cannot Critical Hit.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Beads of Ruin
ability.gametext: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: It is also not affected by other Beads of Ruin abilities.

ability.name: Beast Boost
ability.gametext: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
ability.effect: Increases the Pokémon's highest stat when it knocks out a Pokémon.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: For determining the highest stat to boost, it does not take into account stat stages, any held items, or status conditions that reduce stats.

ability.name: Berserk
ability.gametext: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Big Pecks
ability.gametext: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Blaze
ability.gametext: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
ability.effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Fire-type moves is increased by 50%.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Ability had its damage calculation changed in Generation V onwards. Still essentially results in the same effect.

ability.name: Bulletproof
ability.gametext: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Confusingly, some cannon moves are unaffected by this ability.

ability.name: Cacophany
ability.gametext: Avoids sound-based moves.
ability.effect: Unaffected by sound moves.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: While this ability existed at one point in game files. No known natural Pokémon have this ability. It was completely removed for Gen IV+. Its original ability number was 76.

ability.name: Cheek Pouch
ability.gametext: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Chilling Neigh
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: One of the components of the ability 'As One'.

ability.name: Chlorophyll
ability.gametext: During harsh sunlight, the Speed stat of Pokémon with this Ability is doubled.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Clear Body
ability.gametext: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
ability.effect: Opponents’ moves which lower this Pokémon’s stats have no effect. However this Pokémon may lower its own stats with its own moves.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Cloud Nine
ability.gametext: Eliminates the effects of weather.
ability.effect: All weather effects are negated while the Pokémon is on the field.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: The Japanese name of this Ability was written as a double entendre.

ability.name: Color Change
ability.gametext: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
ability.effect: This Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the last damaging move which hit it.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: From Generation V onwards Color Change now activates after the last hit of a multi-strike move. Future Sight and Doom Desire now activate Color Change when they hit.

ability.name: Comatose
ability.gametext: It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
ability.effect: It acts as if it is affected by the Sleep status condition. All special effects of moves based on the Sleep status condition affect this Pokémon such as Snore and Sleep Talk working from the Pokémon with Comatose and double damage from Hex and Wake-up Slap, Dream Eater and Nightmare and even abilities such as Bad Dreams will activate. This Pokémon can still attack.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Commander
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.
ability.effect: Tatsugiri will go into Dondozo's mouth and be unable to be damaged from attacks. Dondozo can no longer switch out. Dondozo's stats all raise by 2 stages.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Competitive
ability.gametext: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
ability.effect: When a stat of a Pokémon with this Ability is lowered by an opponent, its Special Attack is increased by two stages.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Compoundeyes
ability.gametext: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
ability.effect: Raises the Pokémon’s accuracy by 30%.
ability.fieldeffect: If the Pokémon is in the lead spot, chance of encountering a wild Pokémon holding an item increases from 50% to 60% or 5% to 20%.

ability.name: Contrary
ability.gametext: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
ability.effect: Moves used on the Pokémon that raise stats lower the stats, while the moves that lower the stats raise the stat.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Corrosion
ability.gametext: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Costar
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Cotton Down
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Cud Chew
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Curious Medicine
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon is brought into battle, any stat alterations of allies are removed.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Cursed Body
ability.gametext: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
ability.effect: When a move hits the Pokémon, that move has a 30% chance of getting disabled.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Cute Charm
ability.gametext: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
ability.effect: The opponent has a 30% chance of being induced with Attract when using an attack, that requires physical contact, against this Pokémon.
ability.fieldeffect: If the Pokémon is in the lead spot, chance of encountering a wild Pokémon of the opposite gender will be 66.6%. Does not effect swarming Pokémon. This doesn't work in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet onwards.

ability.name: Damp
ability.gametext: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
ability.effect: Explosion, Selfdestruct, Mind Blown and Misty Explosion will not work while the Pokémon is on the field.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Damp does not prevent the activation of Blast Burn, Powder, Pollen Puff, or Shell Trap.

ability.name: Dancer
ability.gametext: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Dark Aura
ability.gametext: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.
ability.effect: Powers up every Pokémon in play's Dark-type moves by 33%
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: The effects of this ability will not stack multiple times if more than one Pokémon in the team has it.

ability.name: Dauntless Shield
ability.gametext: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat the first time that the Pokémon enters a battle.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Dazzling
ability.gametext: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Defeatist
ability.gametext: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
ability.effect: The Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack is halved when its Hit Points are below 50% of maximum
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Defiant
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: In Pokémon Legends: Arceus's internal code, Hisuian Braviary's Hidden Ability is Defiant instead of Tinted Lens.

ability.name: Delta Stream
ability.gametext: The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type's weaknesses.
ability.effect: Creates the Strong Winds weather. This lasts until the Pokémon exits battle, and weakens moves used on Flying-type Pokémon that would be Super Effective.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Desolate Land
ability.gametext: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.
ability.effect: Creates the Strong Sun weather. This lasts until the Pokémon exits battle, and renders Water-type moves useless.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Disguise
ability.gametext: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
ability.effect: Once per battle, the Pokémon can withstand one damaging attack without receiving any damage. Damage inflicted through entry hazards, weather or status conditions will not break the disguise. Damage from Confusion will break the Disguise. It causes 1/8th of max Hit Point damage when it breaks.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Download
ability.gametext: Compares an opposing Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.
ability.effect: Attack is increased when the foe’s Defense is lower than its Special Defense or increases Special Attack when the foe’s Special Defense is lower than its Defense.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: All Pokémon who have this Ability were either engineered or modified by humans.

ability.name: Dragon's Maw
ability.gametext: Powers up Dragon-type moves.
ability.effect: Increases the damage inflicted by Dragon-type moves by 50%.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Drizzle
ability.gametext: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.
ability.effect: Weather changes to Heavy Rain when the Pokémon enters the battle. As of X and Y, this lasts 5 turns.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Drought
ability.gametext: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
ability.effect: Weather changes to Intense Sunshine when the Pokémon enters the battle. As of X and Y, this lasts 5 turns.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Dry Skin
ability.gametext: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in sunshine, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.
ability.effect: HP is restored when hit by Water-type moves or when it is raining but also makes the Pokémon weak to Fire-type moves and reduces HP during strong sunlight.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.
Sleep conditions lasts for half as long, rounding down. For example, half of three turns is 1.5, which rounds down to one turn. When the number of turns to sleep is one, half of this rounded down is zero, and the Pokémon wakes up instantly.
This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

Generation III

ability.name: Earth Eater
ability.gametext: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
ability.effect: The user recovers 25% of its maximum Hit Points when a Ground-type move is used against it.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Effect Spore
ability.gametext: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
ability.effect: The opponent has a 10% chance of being induced by PARALYZE, POISON, or SLEEP when using an attack, that requires physical contact, against this Pokémon.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Electric Surge
ability.gametext: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
ability.effect: Activates Electric Terrain for 5 turns when the Pokémon enters a battle.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Electromorphosis
ability.gametext: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Embody Aspect
ability.gametext: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Teal Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Speed stat to be boosted.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Embody Aspect and Teraform Zero are the only Abilities that are acquired through Terastallization.

ability.name: Embody Aspect
ability.gametext: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Hearthflame Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Attack stat to be boosted.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Embody Aspect and Teraform Zero are the only Abilities that are acquired through Terastallization.

ability.name: Embody Aspect
ability.gametext: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Wellspring Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat to be boosted.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Embody Aspect and Teraform Zero are the only Abilities that are acquired through Terastallization.

ability.name: Embody Aspect
ability.gametext: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Cornerstone Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Defense stat to be boosted.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: Embody Aspect and Teraform Zero are the only Abilities that are acquired through Terastallization.

ability.name: Emergency Exit
ability.gametext: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
ability.effect: When the Pokémon's Hit Points hit 50% or less, the Pokémon will switch out. Works once per battle. The Pokémon will not switch out if it drops below 50% due to Confusion, Weather, use of Substitute or when the damage inflicted is by a Pokémon with the Sheer Force ability.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This ability will not activate if health is brought back up above 50% due to a hold item.

ability.name: Fairy Aura
ability.gametext: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.
ability.effect: Powers up every Pokémon in play's Fairy-type moves by 33%.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Filter
ability.gametext: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
ability.effect: Super-Effective attacks on the opponent are halved in damage.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This Ability does not exist prior to Generation 4 games, such as Pokemon Diamond, Pearl and Platinum.

ability.name: Flame Body
ability.gametext: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
ability.effect: Might burn the opponent on contact.
ability.fieldeffect: Emerald Version: Any eggs in the party will hatch in 1/2 of the normal time.

ability.name: Flare Boost
ability.gametext: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.
ability.effect: Special Attack stat increased by 50% when burned.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This Ability originated as a TCG Attack.

ability.name: Flash Fire
ability.gametext: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
ability.effect: Stops Fire damage and raises Fire Attack's power.
ability.pkmn_canhave: Vulpix, Ninetales, Growlithe, Arcanine, Houndour, Houndoom, Ponyta, Rapidash, Flareon
ability.fieldeffect: If the Pokémon is in the lead spot, chance of encountering a Fire-type wild Pokémon increases severely. This doesn't work in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet onwards.

ability.name: Flower Gift
ability.gametext: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies when it is sunny.
ability.effect: User removes cloak in sunlight and raises its stats.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This Ability does not exist prior to Generation 4 games, such as Pokemon Diamond, Pearl and Platinum.

ability.name: Flower Veil
ability.gametext: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Fluffy
ability.gametext: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Forecast
ability.gametext: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.
ability.effect: Changes the type of the Pokémon when the weather changes.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Forewarn
ability.gametext: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.
ability.effect: You can see one of your opponent's attacks.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This Ability does not exist prior to Generation 4 games, such as Pokemon Diamond, Pearl and Platinum.

ability.name: Friend Guard
ability.gametext: Reduces damage done to allies.
ability.effect: In Double battles, the damage that ally Pokémon receive from attacks is reduced by 25%.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Frisk
ability.gametext: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
ability.effect: You can see your opponent's held item.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This Ability does not exist prior to Generation 4 games, such as Pokemon Diamond, Pearl and Platinum.

ability.name: Full Metal Body
ability.gametext: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Fur Coat
ability.gametext: Halves the damage from physical moves onto this Pokémon.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Gale Wings
ability.gametext: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
ability.effect: All Flying-type moves have their Speed Priority increased by 1 if the Pokémon's Hit Points are at maximum.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Galvanize
ability.gametext: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
ability.effect: Increases the power of Normal-type moves by 20%. It then changes those moves to Electric-type.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Gluttony
ability.gametext: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
ability.effect: User uses its held berry earlier than normal.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: This Ability does not exist prior to Generation 4 games, such as Pokemon Diamond, Pearl and Platinum.

ability.name: Good as Gold
ability.gametext: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Gooey
ability.gametext: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
ability.effect: Lowers the opponent's Speed by one stage when it makes physical contact.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Gorilla Tactics
ability.gametext: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
ability.effect: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat by one stage, but locks the Pokémon into using the first attack it uses after being sent out.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
ability.notes: In most languages, the name of this ability includes some level of wordplay.

ability.name: Grass Pelt
ability.gametext: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.
ability.effect: Increases Defense by 50% when battling on Grass or if the move Grassy Terrain is in effect
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Grassy Surge
ability.gametext: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
ability.effect: Activates Grassy Terrain for 5 turns when the Pokémon enters a battle.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Grim Neigh
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Special Attack stat.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Guard Dog
ability.gametext: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
ability.effect: As per game text.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Gulp Missile
ability.gametext: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
ability.effect: When using Surf or Dive, it will change into Gulping Form if it has over 50% max HP or Gorging Form if it has less than 50% max HP. If hit afterwards, form reverts and it shoots out its prey to attack, doing 1/4th of opponent's maximum HP in damage. If the Cramorant was in Gulping Form, the opponent's Defense is lowered 1 stage. If the Cramorant was in Gorging Form, the opponent is paralyzed.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.

ability.name: Guts

ability.name: Wimp Out
ability.gametext: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

The Pokémon will not switch out if it drops below 50% due to Confusion, Weather, use of Substitute or when the damage inflicted is by a Pokémon with the Sheer Force ability. It will not activate if health is brought back up above 50% due to a hold item.
ability.fieldeffect: This ability has no out-of-battle effect.
